title: Dům noci
content:
Osobám, které netrápí vysoká cena, nabízí obchodní Wyzima zábavy vyšší úrovně. V Domu Královny noci čekají na klienty nejkrásnější ženy, nabízející rafinované rozkoše a chvíle zapomnění na šedivou realitu.

Úkoly
Modroočka
Poznámky
Marigold suggests that he, Zoltan and Geralt should go to the House of the Queen of the Night after a drink fest that the three have either U Chlupatého medvěda or Nový Narakort, depending on some choices made earlier in the game. He says that they owe him a favour, but does not elaborate further. He also asserts that they do not discriminate based on race, much to Zoltan's relief. Coin (and gems) is the currency there, no judgements.
A painting of Yarpen Zigrin hangs upstairs at the House. He was apparently a very valued customer.
Personál
